title: MAJOR ORDER
briefing: Hold Afoyay Bay and all Magma Planets in order to stabilize construction of Pandora Base, a top-secret foundry for new Galactic defense technology.

title: MAJOR ORDER
briefing: The Festival of Reckoning begins! Ensure every citizen can rejoice in the destruction of Democracy's enemies by vigorously expanding the territory of Freedom.

title: MINOR ORDER
briefing: Celebrate the Festival of Reckoning by reaching the targeted kill count on any one of the specially-chosen weapons testing planets.
